member.name: NET_PHYSICAL_LOCATION
member.summary: The NET_PHYSICAL_LOCATION structure provides NDIS with information about the physical location of a registered network interface.

member.name: NET_PHYSICAL_LOCATION.BusNumber
member.summary: The bus number of the physical location for hardware. If the physical location is unknown, set this member to NIIF_BUS_NUMBER_UNKNOWN. Other values are reserved for NDIS.

member.name: NET_PHYSICAL_LOCATION.SlotNumber
member.summary: The slot number of the physical location for hardware. If the physical location is unknown, set this member to NIIF_SLOT_NUMBER_UNKNOWN. Other values are reserved for NDIS.

member.name: NET_PHYSICAL_LOCATION.FunctionNumber
member.summary: The function number of the physical location for hardware. If the physical location is unknown, set this member to NIIF_FUNCTION_NUMBER_UNKNOWN. Other values are reserved for NDIS.
